attributes.action: ban the sale of guns and knives to members of the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With knife and gun crimes spiralling out of control and daily news reports of innocent victims dying in the streets and inside/outside their own homes, it is time that the sale of these weapons was banned.
We want to reclaim our streets and feel safe to walk them, without fear of attack from people carrying illegal weapons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
